articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Niger Crisis: India asks citizens to leave African country 'as soon as possible' | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Apart from this, the Ministry of External Affairs also advised the Indian nationals to reconsider their travel plans until the situation normalizes.
articles.content: New Delhi: India's Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) on Thursday urged Indian nationals to leave Niger, following a military coup that deposed the democratically elected president, Mohamed Bazoum. T… [+2153 chars]

articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Niger: ECOWAS force on 'standby' as junta names government - DW (English)
articles.description: The leaders of a coup in Niger declared a new government, naming 21 ministers. The move came as leaders of the West African bloc ECOWAS held a summit debating a response to the coup, and activated a "standby" force.
articles.content:
Leaders of the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) bloc met for an emergency summit on the Niger coup Thursday.
In a communique read at the end of the meeting in the Nigerian capital,… [+3492 chars]
